contentText.text: Jian kept the cash, assuming no one would find out. But, many months later, another company launched an investigation into allegations that the same supplier was using inappropriate gifts to buy favors.
Johnson Controls investigated and found that the supplier had given cash to Jian and others.

revelCollOut.text: There is no excuse for violating Johnson Controls' policy.
Jian cannot accept cash gifts of any value. He could face disciplinary action up to and including termination of employment.
